panels.description: Scheduler throughput based on successful operations per second (admitted workloads for Kueue, allocated containers for YuniKorn, scheduled tasks count for Volcano proxy). Higher is better.

targets.expr:
(
  # Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec
  sum(rate(kueue_admitted_workloads_total[5m]))
)
OR
(
  # Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (proxy)
  sum(rate(volcano_task_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_count[5m]))
)
OR
(
  # YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec
  sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state="allocated"}[5m]))
)
OR
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Operation Rate (ops/s)

panels.description: Average CPU cores used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. This is real usage, not simulated by KWOK.
panels.title: Scheduler CPU Usage

panels.description: Current Memory Working Set used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. This is real usage, not simulated by KWOK.
panels.title: Scheduler Memory Usage
Average Job Times
panels.description: Average times for Jobs (K8s & Volcano) based on unified exporter metrics, filtered by job namespace. Wait Time: Created to Start. Execution Time: Start to Completion. Total Time: Created to Completion. Note: Completion time is only available for completed jobs.

panels.title: Job Status Count
panels.description: Number of Jobs (K8s & Volcano) in different states based on unified exporter metrics (filtered by job namespace).
Total number of Pods in each phase over time based on KSM metrics (filtered by namespace). Provides a clear view of system throughput and potential bottlenecks.
panels.title: Pod Phases Over Time (Stacked)

panels.description: Average Pod start latency metrics based on KSM. Calculated as: start_time - creation_timestamp. Time difference represents scheduling delay + image pulling + init containers in KWOK simulated environment.
panels.title: Pod Start Latency (KSM)
Cluster Resources: Overall Simulated Utilization (Node Exporter)

panels.description: Sum of simulated CPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable CPU across worker nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated CPU Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of simulated Memory usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable Memory across worker nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated Memory Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of simulated GPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable GPUs across worker nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated GPU Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Time series of simulated resource usage (pod requests) compared to total allocatable resources over time. Shows dynamic changes in cluster resource allocation. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Simulated Usage Allocation Trends

panels.description: Simulated resource usage (pod requests) over time in absolute values. Shows actual CPU cores, memory bytes, and GPU counts requested across all pods. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Total Simulated Usage Over Time (Absolute)
Cluster Resources: Pod Distribution & Node Load

panels.description: Current number of pods per node compared to allocatable pod capacity and simulated CPU/Memory usage. Uses metrics from node-resource-exporter. KWOK nodes are identified.
panels.title: Pod Count & Usage per Node (Table)

panels.description: Number of Pods scheduled on each worker node over time. Helps identify load balancing and saturation patterns. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Pod Distribution per Node (Timeseries)

panels.description: Distribution of nodes based on their simulated CPU utilization percentage (pod requests / allocatable).
panels.title: Node CPU Utilization Distribution (%)

panels.description: Distribution of nodes based on their simulated Memory utilization percentage (pod requests / allocatable).
panels.title: Node Memory Utilization Distribution (%)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated resource utilization percentage across nodes. Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing.
panels.title: Node Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated GPU utilization percentage across nodes. Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing.
panels.title: Node GPU Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Number of worker nodes with simulated utilization (pod requests / allocatable) exceeding 80% for CPU or Memory.
panels.title: Saturated Nodes Count (>80% Usage)
Cluster Resources: Simulated Usage Details (Per Node Aggregates)
Node Simulated CPU Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated CPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Node Simulated Memory Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated Memory usage (pod requests) across selected nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Node Simulated GPU Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated GPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes. Based on node-resource-exporter. Will show 0 if no GPUs requested or available.
CPU usage (cores) for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory Working Set for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod Memory Usage
$scheduler: Queue Status
panels.description: Shows scheduler-specific queue length metrics (filtered by namespace). Note: These metrics are NOT directly comparable between schedulers (Workloads vs Pods vs Applications). Use the 'Job Status Count' panel (Suspended/Pending) for a comparable view. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Internal Scheduling Latency (P95)
panels.description: P95 internal scheduling/allocation latency reported by the specific scheduler. Namespace filter applied. Note: YuniKorn latency (ms) is converted to seconds. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. See also the combined latency panel in the main section. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Scheduling Attempts/Errors (rate/s)
panels.description: Rate of scheduling/allocation attempts per second, broken down by result/status, as reported by the specific scheduler. Namespace filter applied. Queries are hidden based on the selected '$scheduler' variable. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

list.description: Select namespace(s) where benchmark jobs run.
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Select the scheduler whose specific metrics should be displayed.
list.label: Scheduler
list.name: scheduler

list.description: Select node(s) to filter node-specific views (excludes control-plane by default)
list.label: Node
list.name: node
